dmca.title: DMCA violation at http://elsmar.com/level2/MSDS_Sources.html
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: ILPI [mailto:support@ilpi.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2007 12:43 PM
To: Copyright; Marc.Smith@Elsmar.com
Cc: legal@ilpi.com; restivo@ilpi.com;
adsense-domains-trademark@google.com
Subject: DMCA violation at http://elsmar.com/level2/MSDS_Sources.html
Importance: High

 

Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) we are reporting
an act of copyright infringement by one of your customers at the
following URL:

 

        http://elsmar.com/level2/MSDS_Sources.html

 

Further, your customer is deriving income from this infringement by
posting Google ads on the violating page.

 

Per the reporting requirements of the Act:

 

(i) This communication constitutes an electronic signature that our
company is the legal owner of the copyright involved in item (ii) below.
Interactive Learning Paradigms Incorporated (ILPI) is incorporated in
the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

 

(ii) The infringed material is our copyrighted work at
http://www.ilpi.com/msds/index.html  The offending site may also be
displaying other copyrighted works of ours of which we are not aware.
The offending site is to remove any and all material that originated
from the domain www.ilpi.com as we have never authorized any party to
reproduce those materials.

 

(iii) As stated above, the infringing site is
http://elsmar.com/level2/MSDS_Sources.html   All of the information on
that page except for the ads is infringing.

The offending site may also be displaying other copyrighted works of
ours of which we are not currently aware.

 

(iv) The offending domain elsmar.com resolves to 70.84.93.194.  They are
your customer and we would expect that you have contact information for
them. 

         

(v)  ILPI has *never* authorized any part to reproduce our copyrighted
material in any electronic form or fashion, including the reposting of
our web pages.  This offending use is not authorized by ILPI, its
agents, or the law.  No agent outside of ILPI is authorized to assign,
transfer or license our copyrighted materials.

 

(vi) Under the penalty of perjury, the President of ILPI, Dr. Robert
Toreki, confirms that ILPI owns said copyrights and is authorized to
enforce them.   See both the copyright statements on the page being
infringed in item (ii) above and our copyright policy at
http://www.ilpi.com/copyright.html

 

Your customer is to immediately cease and desist making our copyrighted
work available on your web site or we will take legal action.  Our
rights have been violated under US and International copyright law
including the Digital Milennium Copyright Act, DCMA, and your customer
is making financial gain from their action.

 

Your customer will also remove any other material belonging to our
company that may be hosted on your (or any other) network.

 

Your customer is hereby forewarned that we will seek to recover all
legal and incidental costs we incur should they not immediately comply
with these demands, as well as all ill-gotten gains such as income from
the advertisements they have posted.

 

If you require any other information, please ask.

 

Regards,

 

Dr. Robert Toreki

President, ILPI

-- 

     =================================================
   Interactive Learning Paradigms, Incorporated (ILPI)
Training, environmental/occupational health & safety consulting
Ph: (859) 396-5218, Fax: (859) 523-0606, sales@ilpi.com
